subject: Interview Invitation for Marketing Coordinator Role at NovaTech Inc.
body:
Hi Emily,

Thank you for your interest in the Marketing Coordinator position at NovaTech Inc. We were impressed with your background and would like to invite you to participate in an interview.

The interview is scheduled for Monday, March 25 at 2:00 PM EST and will be conducted via phone call. You will be meeting with Ryan Thompson, Director of Marketing, who will walk you through the role and answer any questions you may have.

Please let us know if this date and time work for you, or feel free to suggest alternative availability such as an in-person interview at our office located at 123 Main St, New York, NY 10001.

Best regards,
Ava Lee
Recruiting Coordinator
NovaTech Inc.
intent: Invite the candidate to interview and confirm availability
